content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, the apartment is in high demand due to its prime location in the city center. I'm sure we can find a suitable price that meets both our needs. Let's start with 1000 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's quite expensive. I am a student and I'm on a budget. I am also a responsible person and I always pay my rent on time. Can you consider lowering the price to 700 euros? I will also take good care of the apartment and make sure to respect the neighbors.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your reliability and respect for the neighbors. However, I must consider the high demand for this apartment and its prime location. How about 950 euros per month? This is a fair price for such a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still too expensive for me as a student. I understand the demand for the apartment, but I hope you can consider my financial situation. Can you lower the price to 800 euros? I will also ensure that the apartment is kept clean and organized.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While I understand your financial situation, I must make the most out of my investment. The apartment's location and condition speak for themselves. However, I am willing to make a compromise. How about 850 euros per month? This is the lowest I can go considering the apartment's value and the market demand.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my financial situation. I appreciate that you are willing to lower the price. I will take good care of the apartment and make sure to pay the rent on time. Can you lower the price to 825 euros?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your persistence, but I must maintain the value of my property. 850 euros per month is the lowest I can go. This price is already a considerable reduction from my initial offer, and I believe it is a fair price for such a prime apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I appreciate your fairness. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I cannot afford the monthly rent of 850 euros. However, I still want to rent the apartment. 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 850 euros is still too high for me as a student. However, I still want to rent the apartment.'
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your financial situation. However, I must maintain the value of my property. If you cannot afford 850 euros per month, we cannot proceed with the rental agreement. 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
